alert.note: Alert for Sharkey (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 4:48PM CDT until April 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN...SOUTHWESTERN YAZOO...SOUTHEASTERN ISSAQUENA AND SOUTHERN SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Valley Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Phoenix around 500 PM CDT. Tinsley around 515 PM CDT. Little Yazoo around 525 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Satartia and Bentonia. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
